name: x-speed-2
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Speed by two stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises Speed by two stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.sun-moon: It sharply raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It sharply raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It sharply raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
